markdownRemark.html:
I made a resume template with Google Docs. Check it out.

I actually didn’t make this for fun, I just couldn’t find any templates I liked. I needed to update my resume, but I’d made mine nearly a decade ago as a Word document, and I had no interest in installing Microsoft Word. Thankfully, Google Docs is pretty robust, so I was able to create a new template there.

Adjust the margins as you wish, and feel free to pass it along!
